Description: Starbound - sverhozhidaemogo fantastic RPG-sandbox, which is the spiritual successor to Terraria! 
In this unique game you will have complete freedom of action. You can destroy everything in their paths, explore caves, mines produce valuable materials to catch monsters and use them as their companions, to build forts, ride on furs and much, much more.

Features:6 playable races.
Randomly generated universe with an infinite number of randomly generated planets.
You can share all things in online games.
Randomly generated dungeons with unique enemies.
Thousands of items.
Advanced crafting system.
PVP-battle.
Equipping your ship for every taste.
Full terraforming their planet.
Fierce fight with the bosses.
Randomly-generated weapons.
Farming, hunting and survival.
Support for mods.
Multiplatformerny multiplayer
